downloads.leadtext1: You need to download the app installer to connect to the virtual space.
downloads.leadtext2: After downloading the installer, follow the instructions to install the application.
downloads.note1: ※ Termination without notice can happen in β-version (BETA).
downloads.note2: ※ It may not work depending on the communication environment or network security even if you use the recommended environment described above.
downloads.note3: comony currently only supports desktop PC.
downloads.note4: We plan to support other devices in the near future
